verses.verse: When <S%H87>Abram<s%> was <S%H8673>ninety<s%>- <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H410>him,<s%> "I am God <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%> <S%H1980>Walk<s%> before <S%H6440>me,<s%> and be <S%H8549>blameless.<s%>
I will <S%H5414>make<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between me and <S%H7235>you,<s%> and will multiply you <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%>"
<S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H559>him,<s%> saying,
"As for <S%H589>me,<s%> <S%H1285>behold,<s%> my covenant is with <S%H1>you.<s%> You will be the father of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

Neither will your <S%H8034>name<s%> any more be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> but your <S%H8034>name<s%> will be <S%H85>Abraham;<s%> for I have made <S%H5414>you<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
I will <S%H6509>make<s%> you <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> of <S%H4428>you.<s%> Kings will come out of <S%H3318>you.<s%>

I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> between me and you and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>you<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> to be a <S%H430>God<s%> to you and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>you.<s%>

I will <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H2233>you,<s%> and to your seed after <S%H310>you,<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> where you are <S%H4033>traveling,<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H272>possession.<s%> I will be their <S%H430>God.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> "As for <S%H8104>you,<s%> you will keep my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> you and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>you<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

This is my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> which you shall <S%H8104>keep,<s%> between me and <S%H310>you<s%> and your <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>you.<s%> Every male among you shall be <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>
You shall be <S%H5243>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%> It will be a <S%H226>token<s%> of the covenant between me and <S%H1285>you.<s%>

He who is <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> will be <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> among <S%H2145>you,<s%> every male throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> he who is <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> or <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> from any <S%H1121>foreigner<s%> who is not of your <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

He who is <S%H3211>born<s%> in your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he who is <S%H4736>bought<s%> with your <S%H3701>money,<s%> <S%H4135>must<s%> be <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%> My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> will be in your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

The <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is not <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H5971>people.<s%> He has <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> "As for <S%H8297>Sarai<s%> your <S%H802>wife,<s%> you shall not <S%H7121>call<s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> her <S%H8034>name<s%> will be <S%H8283>Sarah.<s%>

I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H5414>her,<s%> and moreover I will give you a <S%H1121>son<s%> by <S%H1288>her.<s%> Yes, I will bless <S%H1471>her,<s%> and she will be a mother of nations. <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of peoples will come from <S%H5971>her.<s%>"

Then <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H6711>laughed,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> "Will a child be <S%H3205>born<s%> to him who is one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old?<s%> Will <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> who is <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1323>old,<s%> give <S%H3205>birth?<s%>"
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H430>God,<s%> "Oh <S%H3863>that<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> might <S%H2421>live<s%> before <S%H6440>you!<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H61>"No,<s%> but <S%H8283>Sarah,<s%> your <S%H802>wife,<s%> will <S%H3205>bear<s%> you a <S%H1121>son.<s%> You shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%> I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> for his <S%H2233>seed<s%> after <S%H310>him.<s%>

As for <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> I have heard <S%H8085>you.<s%> <S%H1288>Behold,<s%> I have blessed <S%H6509>him,<s%> and will make him fruitful, and will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> him <S%H3966>exceedingly.<s%> He will become the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H5387>princes,<s%> and I will make <S%H5414>him<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>
But my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> I <S%H6965>establish<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> whom <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> will <S%H3205>bear<s%> to you at this set <S%H4150>time<s%> <S%H312>next<s%> <S%H8141>year.<s%>"
When he <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>talking<s%> with <S%H430>him,<s%> God went <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H85>Abraham.<s%>

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> all who were <S%H3211>born<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and all who were <S%H4736>bought<s%> with his <S%H3701>money;<s%> every <S%H2145>male<s%> among the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of their <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> in the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> as <S%H430>God<s%> had said to <S%H1696>him.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> was <S%H8673>ninety<s%>- <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old,<s%> when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%>
<S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> was <S%H6240>thirteen<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he was <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> in the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his <S%H6190>foreskin.<s%>
In the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> both <S%H85>Abraham<s%> and <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> were <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

All the <S%H582>men<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> those <S%H3211>born<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and those <S%H4736>bought<s%> with <S%H3701>money<s%> of a <S%H1121>foreigner,<s%> were circumcised with <S%H4135>him.<s%>
